title: GStocks PH
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

**Get Started with GStocks PH**

- [Can I open a GStocks PH account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31210291269273-Can-I-open-a-GStocks-PH-account)
- [What are the features of ABCSI Online Trading Platform in GStocks PH?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31210524262297-What-are-the-features-of-ABCSI-Online-Trading-Platform-in-GStocks-PH)
- [How can I upgrade my Basic GStocks PH account to Full GStocks PH account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31210586612633-How-can-I-upgrade-my-Basic-GStocks-PH-account-to-Full-GStocks-PH-account)

**Top-up or Withdraw with GStocks PH**

- [How can I top up my GStocks PH account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/17542490721689-How-can-I-top-up-my-GStocks-PH-account)
- [How can I withdraw from my GStocks PH Wallet account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31210579108633-How-can-I-withdraw-from-my-GStocks-PH-Wallet-account)

**Buy or Sell Philippine Stocks via GStocks PH**

- [How can I buy PH stocks in GStocks PH?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/17532438364057-How-can-I-buy-PH-stocks-in-GStocks-PH)
- [How can I sell PH stocks in GStocks PH?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31210966987161-How-can-I-sell-PH-stocks-in-GStocks-PH)
- [How do I check the status of my GStocks PH order?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31211043753497-How-do-I-check-the-status-of-my-GStocks-PH-order)
- [How can I change or cancel my GStocks PH order?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31211092525593-How-can-I-change-or-cancel-my-GStocks-PH-order)
- [What are the GStocks PH buy and sell fees I need to know about?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/17542731035289-What-are-the-GStocks-PH-buy-and-sell-fees-I-need-to-know-about)
[See all 6 articles](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/sections/12859299873049-Buy-or-Sell-Philippine-Stocks-via-GStocks-PH)

**Manage your GStocks PH Account**

- [How can I update my account information in my GStocks PH account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31218818513305-How-can-I-update-my-account-information-in-my-GStocks-PH-account)
- [Are there dividend stocks available in GStocks PH?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31218842595353-Are-there-dividend-stocks-available-in-GStocks-PH)
- [What are the applicable cash or property dividend taxes in GStocks PH?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31219798745625-What-are-the-applicable-cash-or-property-dividend-taxes-in-GStocks-PH)
- [Can I transfer stockholdings to another Philippine stock brokerage firm in GStocks PH?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31225286057369-Can-I-transfer-stockholdings-to-another-Philippine-stock-brokerage-firm-in-GStocks-PH)
- [How can I close my GStocks PH account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31259171664537-How-can-I-close-my-GStocks-PH-account)

**Get Help with GStocks PH**

- [I withdrew funds from my GStocks PH account to my GCash wallet but they have not been reflected yet. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/41043122312857-I-withdrew-funds-from-my-GStocks-PH-account-to-my-GCash-wallet-but-they-have-not-been-reflected-yet-What-do-I-do)
- [My Sell Order has not been reflected in my GStocks PH Wallet. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/41042765699353-My-Sell-Order-has-not-been-reflected-in-my-GStocks-PH-Wallet-What-do-I-do)
- [I can’t access my GStocks PH account. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31219924239769-I-can-t-access-my-GStocks-PH-account-What-do-I-do)
- [I can’t open an account in GStocks PH. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31220488898329-I-can-t-open-an-account-in-GStocks-PH-What-do-I-do)
- [How can I follow up on my GStocks PH account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31221554401945-How-can-I-follow-up-on-my-GStocks-PH-account)
[See all 9 articles](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/sections/12859366992025-Get-Help-with-GStocks-PH)

Back to Top
